this pattern property of bamboomint amy woodhouse antenna star start with yarn b and hold the yarn together with a strand of gold thread work in a continuous spiral of rounds 01 5sc in magic_ring 5 02 increase x5 10 03 *single_crochet half_double_crochet 1chpc single_crochet* slip_stitch x4 *single_crochet half_double_crochet 1chpc single_crochet* 25 to finish invisibly fasten_off by cutting the yarn and sewing into the back loop of the second st from the first round then sew into the back loop of the last st made in the final round see images below attach the stem to the star by sewing the beginning round of the stem into one side of the star at the back then sew the stem onto the first round of the top of the body using the left over yarn tail 01 02 03 04 final note thank you for
